Message:
Letting yourself get hurt,
just to protect Aura...!

Why is it always
the kindest souls that get hurt?!

Aura and this girl
are the last people
who deserve to die!
So, please...!

Suddenly,
golden light shot out
from the glass casket,
covering Tillie.

The light that had enveloped
Tillie then circled around me...
before finally dissipating
into the sky.

When Tillie opened her eyes,
she muttered Aura’s name...

I closed my eyes
before the empty casket.
Aura is now free...

and with her gone,
my reason for living
is also—

“Would you like to travel
the world with me?”

Opening my eyes once more,
Tillie was there,
extending her hand up to me.

Ahh...
It’s just like back then.
When I met Aura
for the first time...

Sorry, Aura.
I’m going to try living
a little longer.

Just like with you,
I’m going to do
everything I can
to protect this girl
who reached out to me.

When everything is over,
I’ll come join you.

So please, just wait
a little longer for me...
